data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Larix dahurica (Dahurican larch) from sample USTNERLA-112

Exposition N, Slope 15 deg, Geology: Silikat-Hangschutt-Block, av. Tree height 1 m, Tree cover 25%, Shrub cover 10%, Herb cover 90%, Moss cover 40%, Vegatation type: LADA-Flechten-Lärchenwald, Film number: 957A
